results.title: Faith Over Fear T-Shirt, Christian Shirt, Faith Top, Religious T Shirt, Church Tee, Grace, Joy, Sunday Best
results.description:
Welcome to Arden’s Apparel! We specialize in offering unique, custom designed t-shirts that express your passions and hobbies. Our shirts are hand-printed on only the softest, premium Bella Canvas shirts!

We are a small team with BIG hearts! We work hard to provide you quality products quickly. Your happiness is our number one priority. For all inquiries, please contact us directly on our Etsy shop. We would love to ease your mind and make your shopping experience a positive one!

We have the following valid promo codes currently. 
Please keep in mind that you can only use 1 promo code. Free shipping is only for domestic shipping. 

Discount available on bulk orders! 
••• Spend $35 and get shipping for free. Use code SPEND35 
••• Spend $100 get 10% off. Use code SPEND100GET10
••• Spend $200 get 20% off. Use code SPEND200GET20

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
“HOW TO ORDER CUSTOM T-SHIRT”
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

1.	Please, Check and Review all Photos.

2.	Select Your T-Shirt Style and Size drop down menu.

3.	Select Your Product Color from Drop-down menu.

4.	Choose Your Quantity as much as you want.

5.	You will see “Add Your Personalization” Section which is located below the quantity box. Please Specify your ''TEXT'', ''TEXT COLOR'', ''FONT NUMBER'' for your Family T-shirt. 

a.	Enter your DESIGN Color
	Example: White
b.	Text / DESIGN Color: Black

***Do NOT leave custom wording/design change requests in "Notes" or "Personalization Box." It will not be accepted unless prior approval from us. ***

6.	Your shipping will automatically combine when ordering multiples.

7.	Click ADD TO CART. And, you can go back to add more product color for your family members and text colors, or You can complete the checkout process.

8.	Please Click “Proceed to Check Out”

9.	Finally, Your Custom Shirts will be ready to ship 1-3 Business Day.

NOTE:
If there is no specification of text color and fonts, we will be using the default colors and font.
 
Default Text Color BLACK for T-Shirts:
White | Heather Light Gray | Orange
 
Default Text Color WHITE for T-shirts:
Black | Purple | Red | Heather Dark Gray | Heather Maroon | Kelly Green | Heather Green | Heather Olive | Heather Mauve

Printed and Shipped in the USA.

⬥ OPTIONAL UPGRADES: 
 
Add Text:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/924403960/add-front-or-back-text-shirt-add-on-item?ref=shop_home_active_4&frs=1

Rush Order:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/938446709/rush-my-order-expedite-processing-time?ref=shop_home_active_1&frs=1

Priority Mail:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/938469677/upgrade-to-priority-mail-or-express-mail?ref=shop_home_active_2&frs=1

Upgrade T-Shirt Size:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/938454573/upgrade-style-or-size-after-purchase?ref=shop_home_active_3&frs=1

⬥ WHAT'S INCLUDED: 
This listing is for one shirt only. Purchase them separately to make a set :) Adjust quantity or repeat "HOW TO ORDER" steps to add multiples.

⬥ ORDER COMMUNICATION: 
Check your Etsy messages FREQUENTLY after ordering until order is received. We may have questions or have received missing/incorrect info with order. NEVER email us, always use Etsy messaging.

⬥ CUSTOM REQUESTS:
We are NOT currently accepting custom orders other than our customizable listings (names, dates) marked "CUSTOM" in the title. If you have a design idea you would like to see in our store, please message us. We may already be in process of adding it!
 
Do not leave design change requests in notes with order unless approved by us. If so, it will not be accepted & the original design will still be sent. We accommodate when we can, but some designs we do not edit or cannot be due to time constraints. 

⬥ COLOR/DESIGN INFO: 
Please be mindful when choosing your shirt/text color combinations. Some combos are harder to read. We respect customer preferences and realize some like text more subtle. We do not offer exchanges/returns based on unfavorable color combinations.
 
NOT READABLE: White text on white or heather white, black text & dark grey text on black shades, dark grey text on dark grey or deep heather etc.

HARD TO READ: Black text on dark grey heather, rose gold on heather mauve etc.

SOMEWHAT HARD: White text on athletic heather or ice blue, dark grey text on some medium color shades.
 
We respect customer choice of color selection and process all color combos as selected. The exception is any combos from the "NOT READABLE" category above. We will attempt to contact you, but If no response on Etsy within 24-48 hours, we reserve right to change text colors to a readable text/shirt combo.

⬥ 3XL / 4XL / 5XL, KIDS:
Final sale on all 3XL/4XL/5XL, kids, and sweatshirts. These are special ordered items, no stock. Please allow and extra 1-3 business days for processing. Some colors may be out of stock by suppliers. To check color availability before ordering, contact us!
If your color is not available, we will contact you for another selection.

⬥ COLOR VARIATIONS: 
We try our best for accurately depict colors, but actual colors may vary from your screen display settings. Also, shirts may appear different in color/brightness (especially heathers) under various lighting conditions (studio, indoor, outdoor, etc.). We do not offer returns/exchanges for this.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
**IMPORTANT** SIZING & FIT: 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

⬥ GENERAL SIZING INFO:
Find your style below to see the general sizing info & recommendations.

Unisex sizes inches (cm):
••• Unisex XS: half chest 161/2″ (42 cm), full length 27″ (69 cm)
••• Unisex S: half chest 19 1⁄2″ (50 cm), full length 27″ (69 cm)
••• Unisex M: half chest 21″ (53 cm), full length 28 1⁄2″ (72 cm)
••• Unisex L: half chest 22″ (56 cm), full length 29″ (74 cm)
••• Unisex XL: half chest 23″ (58 cm), full length 30″ (76 cm) 
••• Unisex XXL: half chest 24 1⁄2″ (62 cm), full length 30 1⁄4″ (78 cm)
••• Unisex 3XL: half chest 28″ (71 cm), full length 33 (83 cm)
••• Unisex 4XL: half chest 30/(76), full length 34 (86 cm)

Kid's sizes inches (cm) 
••• 02A (Age 2): half chest 12″ (31 cm), full length 16″ (41 cm)
••• 04A (Age 4): half chest 13 1⁄2″ (34 cm), full length 17 1⁄2″ (44 cm)
••• 06A (Age 6): half chest 14 1⁄2″ (37 cm), full length 18 1⁄2″ (47 cm)
••• 08A (Age 8): half chest 15 1⁄2″ (40 cm), full length 19 1⁄2″ (50 cm)
••• 10A (Age 10): half chest 17″ (43 cm), full length 21 1⁄2″ (54 cm)
••• 12A (Age 12): half chest 18″ (46 cm), full length 23″ (58 cm)

Note: Any sizing info is general suggestions & NOT a substitute for measuring! Since body types & preferences can vary significantly, we DO NOT guarantee fit. ALWAYS MEASURE -- then compare size chart with your own shirt for best results! 

⬥ SIZING VARIATIONS:
Variations in measurements up to 0.5" are acceptable within manufacturer's guidelines.

⬥ STYLES:
 Unisex Tee / Unisex V-Neck

⬥ SIZING INFO:
••• Our Unisex tee is longer and looser than women's sizing & semi-fitted for men but works great for both.
••• For ladies: consider same size for relaxed, loose, knotted fit or size down for fitted look 
••• For men: same size for a more fitted look or size up for relaxed fit.
••• Most women say they run a little big, but opinions differ, and body types/preferences vary! Measure for best results.

⬥ MATERIAL:
(ALL PRE-SHRUNK)
••• Heather colors: 52% cotton / 48% poly -- Super-soft blend!
••• Athletic & Black Heather: 90 cotton /10 poly
••• White & other solids: 100% ring-spun cotton
••• 4.2 oz., lightweight & soft
••• Lighter colors may need layered

⬥ PRODUCT NOTES:
All shirts are made using high quality materials and pressed with a commercial-grade heat press for durability.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
SHIPPING
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

⬥ PROCESSING TIMES:
Your order will be ready to ship within 1-3 business days after payment clears on Etsy. 
(additional processing time required for special orders, 3XL-4XL,5XL and custom designs)

⬥ HOLIDAY SEASON: 
Longer times during holidays may apply.
Check shop Announcement for any cut-off date or processing time changes.
If ordered past cut-off deadline, we will still send via your shipping method even if it will not arrive before holiday.

⬥ SHIPPING TIMES:
All items are shipped via USPS, estimates are below: 
 
First Class Mail: 2-5 days
Priority Mail: 1-3 days
Priority Mail Express: 1-2 days
 
NOTE: Processing times are in addition to shipping times!!

⬥ WRONG ADDRESS:
Contact us immediately on Etsy if wrong address is entered. We will try to correct it but cannot guarantee since order may have shipped. We are not responsible if delivered to a wrong address entered by customer.

⬥ RUSH YOUR ORDER:
If you have a NEED BY DATE, please leave note with exact date.
We will try to accommodate the request & expedite the processing only. This does NOT expedite shipping times unless YOU upgrade. It is your responsibility to upgrade shipping in the event you need it by certain date!

To guarantee expedited processing (especially during busy holidays), purchase the "Rush your Order" listing: 

https://www.etsy.com/listing/938446709/rush-my-order-expedite-processing-time?ref=shop_home_active_1&frs=1

⬥ FREE SHIPPING to PRIORITY UPGRADE MAIL or EXPRESS UPGRADE MAIL

FREE SHIPPING promotions are for domestic, standard First Class mail only!
ALL free shipping on $35+ orders weighing under 16oz are sent First Class Mail, even if Etsy displays it as Priority Mail.
Contact us to verify shipping method. If you need to upgrade free standard shipping to Priority Mail use link:

https://www.etsy.com/listing/938469677/upgrade-to-priority-mail-or-express-mail?ref=shop_home_active_2&frs=1

⬥ SHIPPING LIABILITY:
••• We cannot guarantee USPS shipping times, they are only estimates.
••• We are never responsible for lost, stolen, damaged, or mis-delivered packages
••• We are never responsible for USPS transit delays or mishaps 
(once it leaves our store, it is beyond our control)
••• Etsy provides tracking by email with expected delivery, please watch for expected packages
••• We do not offer refunds or replacement order for USPS mishaps, buyer assumes risk 

WE DO NOT guarantee a delivery date. There are USPS delays that are out of my control.

Once your package has been handed off to the carrier, we do not have any control over when you ultimately receive it. Sometimes we will ship an order and the carrier will fail to scan it right away, meaning, the tracking information makes it appear your package has not left here when it has. If your order left our facility and is still in transit to you, we are unable to make the carrier deliver the package any faster If time is of the essence for your order, we suggest using USPS Next Day express. You can upgrade your shipping at checkout. First class is free.

⬥ DAMAGED PACKAGES:
••• If package appears damaged, DO NOT open. Take to local USPS to file a claim. 
Not Received:
••• If an item was marked "delivered" but not received contact the USPS immediately & file "lost mail" claim online
(also check with local P.O. branch, neighbors, and mail carrier)
••• Check with USPS for any delivery/transit issues. We will try to assist you on our end, but are only responsible for your order until it is scanned as "received" at post office. 
••• On occasion, missing packages turn up and are redelivered later once filed as lost mail.

⬥ RETURNED ITEMS:
Any items returned to us for any reason ex. (wrong address, undeliverable, etc.), buyer must pay reshipping fee to have order resent. We will attempt to contact you with link for repurchase. Any returned items in our possession for 90 days, with failure to receive response or reshipping payment, the items will be donated, and buyer will assume loss of order. 

Return/Exchange Listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/924441124/returnexchange-shipping-shipping-for-an?ref=shop_home_active_5&frs=1

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
POLICIES
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
 
Check "Shop Policies" tab on homepage for current policies & see FAQs for more info.

https://www.etsy.com/shop/ArdensApparel?ref=simple-shop-header-name&listing_id=924441124

⬥ CANCELLATIONS:
To cancel an order, you MUST contact us via ETSY (not email) immediately - within 1 HOUR of purchase.
No exceptions! We ship out fast...most likely we have already started on it.

⬥ RETURNS/REFUNDS:
We do not offer refunds or returns for any reason. 
Please verify all order details and read all "item details/description" section before ordering!
 
⬥ EXCHANGES:
 WHAT CAN BE EXCHANGED:
••• Eligible short sleeve crew & V-neck shirt styles ONLY
••• Must be from our standard (non- personalized) and non-seasonal listings 
 ••• See full list of exclusions - Many items in our shop are FINAL SALE.
 
⬥ OUR POLICY ⬥
••• Customer must pay ALL shipping charges (to/from) for exchanges.
••• We do not provide a return label.
••• Customer assumes the risk of any loss in shipping return items.
 
NOTE: To keep our prices low and continue to offer so many custom style & color options, we ONLY accept exchanges for a different size in some cases. 
 
Items exchanged for different size must be in same shirt style /color/ writing combo and design. Please read below for exclusions and conditions.
 
⬥ EXCLUSIONS (NOT ELIGIBLE):
••• Final sale/Closeout
••• 3XL & 4XL & 5XL sizes - due to special ordering
••• All Kids, infant bodysuits
••• All tank tops, long sleeve, & sweatshirts (these are seasonal)
••• Any listings with CUSTOM word, date, year, name to be entered
••• Changes to existing design requested by customer
••• Holiday theme or seasonal designs, season listed (ex. FALL vibes, 2020)
••• Special ordered items
••• Items with text added
••• Any hard to read color combinations (see list in "color/design info" heading above)
••• Unfavorable colors/ color variances from your screen
••• Wrong color selections/ entry errors
••• Any misspelled words by customer in entry box (we print exactly as you enter)
 
⬥ EXCHANGE TIMES:
Contact us: within 3 DAYS of USPS delivery date.
Item Returned to us: within 7 DAYS of USPS delivery date.

⬥ NO EXCEPTIONS: After these dates we can no longer accept exchanges as the items may have been worn, washed, etc.
 
⬥ EXCHANGE STEPS:
••• It is buyer's responsibility to contact us within 3 days to initiate exchange process & pay ALL exchange shipping fees (to/from)
••• Item must be approved for exchange then shipped back by customer to our address within 7 days of receipt.
••• To exchange for item of higher dollar value (ex. From XL to XXL) the difference must be paid.
••• The Re-shipment fee must be paid to cover shipping cost of the replacement item. Link below.
••• It is up to customer to request tracking on exchange packages and to notify us before shipping. We are not responsible for lost/ mis-delivered items that do not reach us.
••• Returned Item must be like-new. See FAQ below under "EXCHANGE - CONDITIONS"
••• We have the right to refuse exchange if exchange conditions are not met.
 
⬥ EXCHANGE SHIPPING FEE:
This covers the cost to ship the correct size shirt to you. It must be paid before item is sent. We will send a link via Etsy to purchase once we have received your approved return (or use link below). It must be paid before item is sent and within 5 business days of receiving the return item. Failure to pay or respond within 30 days, we reserve the right to cancel exchange & donate the returned shirt. 

Reshipment listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/924441124/returnexchange-shipping-shipping-for-an?ref=shop_home_active_5&frs=1

⬥ RETURN ITEM CONDITION:
Al items MUST BE in new condition…unworn, unwashed, undamaged, unused, & kept free of pet hair, stains, rips, smoke, &, & another odor, etc. Please make sure the item is in perfect condition before sending back for an exchange! 
SEE FAQ's for return item condition.
 
⬥ UNRETURNABLE CONDITION:
Any returned items not meeting the return conditions will be denied. A reshipping link will be sent via Etsy for you to pay to have the unapproved item sent back. Failure to do so within 7 days will result in loss of item which will be donated.
 
⬥ UNAUTHORIZED RETURNS:
Only send items to be exchanged if you have first contacted us and received authorization. Any exchange packages received (that have not been approved by us) -- the package will not be opened or processed. A reshipping link will be sent via Etsy for customer to pay to have package returned to them. Failure to do so within 7 days will result in loss of item which will be donated.
 
See our FAQ's below for our DETAILED return/exchange policy BEFORE ordering.
 
⬥ REPLACEMENTS/ ERRORS:
In the event we make an error, we will kindly work with you to get it resolved. 
 
REPLACEMENT CLAIM STEPS:
1.  Please contact us within 3 business days via Etsy (not email)
2.  Send a VERY CLEAR pic of the error & description via ETSY convo
3.  We will determine if it is an error on our part and send a replacement ASAP if so
 
EXCEPTIONS:
Any items that have large stains/spills/rips or tears (from opening package) or any other obvious damage that would NOT have been overlooked when packaging will be denied. No exceptions. We are human but also diligently look over every item before shipping.
We are not responsible for damage to item caused by customer after receipt.
 
PRESS MARKS/WRINKLES:
Any press marks/creases (from heat press) or wrinkles from package handling will be removed upon laundering your item. Please follow appropriate care instructions. This is not a reason for return or exchange.
 
DAMAGED PACKAGES:
If a package appears damaged upon receipt, do not open. Take to local USPS and file claim.
 
ERROR REFUNDS:
We do not offer refunds on any errors (even if need-by-date has passed) but will gladly send out a replacement. 
Please order in enough advance to account for any errors/unforeseen events.
 
⬥ CONTACT US:
If you do have a problem with your order, PLEASE contact us via ETSY so we can resolve any issues. Customer service is our top priority! We want you to LOVE your clothing and shopping experience!
 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
CARE INSTUCTIONS
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
 
**ROSE GOLD font & other metallic are COLD wash only, gentle cycle, inside out**

All others:
Machine Wash Gentle Cycle (Warm or Cold) or Hand Wash with mild detergent
Hang Dry (preferred) or Tumble dry Low
DO NOT Bleach or Iron on Design
 
See DETAILED CARE INSTRUCTIONS in our FAQ section for proper care of your garment!! 
We are not responsible for damage to garments due to improper care.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
CONNECT
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

⬥ Connect with us on social media for special promotions/sales! Share the love on social media and tag us for a chance of free giveaways! ⬥

Etsy: 
https://www.etsy.com/shop/ArdensApparel

Facebook: Coming Soon…
Instagram: Coming Soon…
Pinterest: Coming Soon…
For more designs, shop our store: Coming Soon…
 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
ABOUT US
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
 
We are a family-owned small business with big heart ❤ 
Thanks for choosing to shop with us! We hope you love our stuff as much as we do. Your supports mean the World to us. 
We love our customers and strive for excellent quality & customer service! 
  
Thanks for shopping!

Arden’s Apparel

results.title: Live Laugh Love Sticker, waterproof sticker, water bottle stickers
results.description: This is a 3" wide waterproof sticker that you can put on drinkware, laptops, car windows, books, just about anywhere you'd like to use it.  Thank you for supporting small businesses!

results.title: Coral Dog Bow Tie, Bow tie attached to brown dog collar, Burlap, Coral wedding accessory, Christmas gift, Cat Bow tie,Country Rustic wedding
Inspirational Printable - Instant Download - Autumn Leaves - Digital Inspirational Quote Print - Wall Decor - Wall Art - Watercolor Flowers
results.description:
This inspirational quote print will make a wonderful addition to your home decor or make a wonderful gift. All you have to do is purchase this instant download listing and your artwork will be ready to download, print and enjoy!

Looking for additional sizes or colors for this design? Let me know and I'll be happy to work with you to create the perfect piece. There will be an additional fee for custom orders. Please convo me the listing you are interested in modifying and I will create a custom listing for you to purchase. 


--INCLUDED--

-One (1) high resolution 8x10 PDF file
-One (1) high resolution 8x10 JPG file


--INSTRUCTIONS--

-Purchase this instant download. A high resolution 8x10 JPG and PDF file will be available for download once your payment has been verified. 


--FOR YOUR INFORMATION--

-This is a digital file and NO physical items will be shipped to you.

- Please note that NOT all computer monitors are calibrated the same, so colors of designs may vary slightly.


--PERSONAL USE ONLY--

-All files/designs/art/prints are for personal use ONLY. Do not share, sell or redistribute files. Not for RESALE.

results.title: Words of Encouragement Painted Rock, Stay Strong, Have Faith, Affirmation Stones, Live Love Laugh, Words of Wisdom Stones
results.description:
**Learn to paint your own rocks through my digital Rock Painting Masterclass: https://etsy.me/3cLi8sA

This hand-painted rock is a great gift of encouragement and affirmation. Choose a phrase ("Stay Strong," "Have Faith," or "Live, Love, Laugh) from the drop-down menu.  If you select "other," please leave me a Note to Seller at checkout with the custom phrase you want.

This is painted on a Hunter green background with flowers (white flowers with either a yellow daisy). It is painted with acrylics, coated with a protective varnish, and measures approximately 3 x 2 inches. 

This item would make a perfect token for someone going through a hard time.  Also great as a Christmas gift or a gift for any occasion!  

I can customize any "words of encouragement" on my rocks.  Click "Add an optional note to seller" at checkout and tell me what you need. Need a smaller item to stash in a pocket or bag? Have a look at my hand-stamped coins and charms here==>> https://www.etsy.com/shop/AlleluiaRocks?ref=seller-platform-mcnav&section_id=26599865

Thanks for visiting Alleluia Rocks!

NOTE: If you are using a mobile device and would like a custom order, click "Contact" or "Ask a Question" and let me know what you need. Want a FREE Rock Painting Tutorial? Just join my email list! Copy & paste this URL into your browser ==>> https://www.subscribepage.com/freetutorial

results.title: Alive Ahaha Fuck Car Decal, Laptop, Hydroflask, Vinyl Sticker, Custom Color Decal
results.description:
Alive Ahaha F*ck Car Decal!

Many custom color options to choose from!
•Please see listing photo for color swatches•
**Actual color may vary slightly due to differences in screen displays**

All decals are made from premium quality Oracal 651 outdoor grade vinyl. 
The decal may be removed but we do not recommend re-using.

——————————————————————

Orders will come with instruction sheet for application. Instructions: clean surface and allow it to dry, peel decal from backing, align and place decal taking care avoid any creases or bubbles. We recommend waiting a full 48 hours before exposing the decal to water/snow/ice/etc. 

——————————————————————

We recommend measuring the area where you plan to place the decal to ensure that you select the correct size at checkout! If you would like a custom size, please message me BEFORE ordering. (Non-standard sizing may result in additional cost and/or longer processing time)

——————————————————————

I offer FREE SHIPPING for all of my decals. Please note, I am unable to offer tracking with my free standard shipping. If you are concerned about shipping, please choose the shipping option with tracking OR message me to discuss your shipping options!

——————————————————————

Looking for a custom decal? Message me - I would be happy to help!

——————————————————————

Thank you for shopping with RiverTownHoney! For more decals and other unique items, please visit our shop! :)

results.title: Beautifully hand crafted 3 dimensional Intarsia Wood Art HUMMINGBIRD & LILY Picture Photo Frame
results.description:
Beautifully hand-crafted 3-dimensional Intarsia HUMMINGBIRDS & LILY Wood Picture Photo Frame.

This piece of intarsia wood art required a lot of workmanship since it was hand-carved from 44 different pieces of wood with different thickness and glued together on a wood base to form this Hummingbirds & Lily Picture Frame.

Shelf display or wall hanging (the frame has a stand and also a hook on the back). 

All hand-carved using different kinds of wood to bring different colors for the piece. So, the colors of wood here are natural colors of wood. For this feature, it's almost like one-of-a-kind because next time if we make the same design again, it won't look exactly the same as the wood grain will change slightly. Also, each piece is hand-carved individually, so it's all unique. (The actual item you'll receive maybe very slightly different than what pictured since each piece is hand-crafted individually. However, we're confident you'll love the piece you receive regarding beauty and quality. We can confirm this because we have a lot of repeated happy customers).

Semi-gloss finish.

It would add a very beautiful & interesting item to your collection or make a perfect gift idea.....

Overall measurements : approximately 12" long X 9.25" high X 1" thick.

The frame measures approximately 7-3/8" high X 5.5" wide.

Photo area measures approximately 5-7/8" high X 3-7/8" wide.

Item # PF-Hummingbirds&Lily-1A

Hand crafted by B.Evans

Original Price : $100

Today Price : $49.95 . You save : $50

results.title: Bracelet - Live Love Laugh
results.description:
Delivery time within Germany: 3 - 7 days from payment.

A beautiful bracelet with the inscription "Live Love Laugh" in the following color variant:
Mint-Bordeaux red-yellow-silver

You can also express your own wishes or colour wishes.
Suggestions for this can be found in my shop.

Please specify BEFORE the purchase if more bracelets are needed. Then I can increase the available number of pieces.

These are high-quality wooden beads (maple) from German production (sweat-proof, saliva-resistant, colour-resistant and pollutant-free according to toy standard DIN EN 71-3).
The letter beads are made of plastic.

The wooden beads and letter beads are threaded onto an elastic rubber thread, which is used in jewelry making and is very tear-resistant.

Materials used:
Elastic rubber thread 0.8 mm
Letter Beads 7 mm
Wooden beads 8 mm
Metal spacers

Approximate indicative dimensions:
11 cm approx. 0 - 1 years
12 cm approx. 1 - 2 years
13 cm approx. 3 - 4 years
14 cm approx. 4 - 5 years
15 cm approx. 6 - 7 years
16 cm approx. 8 - 10 years
17 cm approx. 11 - 14 years
18 cm+ Teenagers and Adults

Experience for women: 18 cm
